channel.title: How to add a object
channel.description: i know where to add a object but i dont know how. its in client.java and i know where its at can someone tell me how to add a scoreboard

item.title: How to add a object
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

ok… in client.java search:

public void NewObjects() {

below it add:

makeGlobalObject(XXXX, YYYY, OBJ ID, -3, 10);

XXXX= X axis
YYYY= Y axis
OBJ ID= well… the objectid
-3= the direction. i cant quite remember which # is what direction. just guess n test.
10= cant remember… its always 10 tho lol

as for the actual scoreboard data, all i know is it requires u to code in so that when u click it it brings a menu up.

Read full topic
